message.body: Hey! Ru coming to the city soon? I'll be going to philly in two weeks but not sure if you'll be back from Israel?
I booked a shuttle from philly to jfk because it would be much simpler; but i fly back on the 18th, we could grab lunch or coffee then
Have fun!! If you're looking for a place to stay in the south let me know!! My parents are super nice and have extra rooms open
